title: Create a Bookmark in HTML
text: Bookmarks can be useful if a web page is very long.

To create a bookmark - first create the bookmark, then add a link 
to it.

When the link is clicked, the page will scroll down or up to the location with the 
bookmark.

title: Example
text:
First, use the id attribute to create a 
bookmark:
Then, add a link to the bookmark ("Jump to Chapter 4"), from within the same page:
Example Jump to Chapter 4 Try it Yourself »
You can also add a link to a bookmark on another page:

title: HTML Link Tags
text: For a complete list of all available HTML tags, visit our HTML Tag Reference.
